name: Smiley - Your Sentient Virtual Pet
description:
Smiley is a virtual friend who will be there for you *always*!

Click to feed it. Don't let poor Smiley perish!

Smiley's dialogue is generated, given short prompts, by a machine learning language model called GPT-J. Its choice of words may be bizzare and in some cases offensive. Please note that such dialogue is not written by me, and as yet its speech is unfiltered.

This game runs in Python3, and depends on the 'pygame' pip package. To run, call 'python main py' in your command line or terminal.

P.S. please don't use and abuse the API key included in the game's source code. There is a monthly limit on input characters for the model's prompts and this could quickly expire.
